definition: to substitute/to act on behalf of others/to replace/generation/dynasty/age/period/(historical) era/(geological) eon

sentences.english: Can you name three celebrity endorsers who endorse the sports brand?
sentences.chinese: 请阁下举出三个运动品牌的代言人？

sentences.english: I will change my perspective towards the personal care product due to the behavior of celebrity endorser.
sentences.chinese: 名人代言人的行为会影响我对该个人护理产品的看法。

sentences.english: Emilia is the voice of conscience in the play.
sentences.chinese: 埃米莉亚在这出戏中是良知的代言人。

sentences.english: John Terry and Michael Owen of Newcastle endorse the brand.
sentences.chinese: 球员特里和欧文是其广告代言人。

sentences.english: My father is very humorous, I can say when Walch.
sentences.chinese: 爸爸很幽默，说我能当“威露士代言人”。

sentences.english: Today, there are those who claim to have representatives of the Sion strain especially in the U.
sentences.chinese: 如今在美国有着许多拥戴西翁品系的无数代言人。

sentences.english: On the one hand, the children who are below ten years old can't be the spokespersons.
sentences.chinese: 一方面，小于十岁的孩子不能成为代言人。

sentences.english: Kenji Hiranabe is the face of agile in Japan.
sentences.chinese: 平锅健児在日本差不多是敏捷的代言人。

sentences.english: Celebrity endorser affects my perspective towards the personal care product.
sentences.chinese: 名人代言人能影响我对该个人护理产品的看法。

sentences.english: It calls for teachers to speak for it and redeem the world.
sentences.chinese: 它召请上主之师为它的代言人，来救赎世界。

sentences.english: The Chinese often praise Liu and the basketball star Yao Ming for their modesty.
sentences.chinese: 中国人经常赞美刘翔和姚明为他们中庸之道的代言人。

sentences.english: Hardy is the spokesman of the traditional country life and local culture.
sentences.chinese: 哈代是传统的乡村主活及地方文化的代言人。

sentences.english: Easy to wear, feminine and sophisticated - this watch makes a fashion statement.
sentences.chinese: 优雅妩媚又易于配衬，这款手表是时尚的代言人。

sentences.english: Adam realizes that by changing his name he's made himself a spokesman for Tensta.
sentences.chinese: 亚当认识到通过改名能让自己成为坦斯达的代言人。

sentences.english: I think that the behavior of celebrity endorser can affect the image of personal care product.
sentences.chinese: 我认为名人代言人的行为影响该个人护理产品的形象。

sentences.english: How did you decide the internet was the best mouthpiece for your views?
sentences.chinese: 你如何确定互联网就是你观点的最好代言人？

definition: to be a spokesperson/to be an ambassador (for a brand)/to endorse
person who represents an organization and enhances its image/ambassador
currently popular (of movie stars, singers etc)
Cenozoic (geological era covering the last 65m years)
a favorite of sb in power/a celebrity/American Indian
to enter deeply into people's hearts/to have a real impact on the people (idiom)
